name: Protect Thy Sphere thingy
description:
Have you ever wanted to be a Orbiting satellite fighting for a small minimalistic cute Planet, which is being invaded by stylish looking Aliens.

Now you can !
Presenting Protect Thy Sphere thingy, endless shooter.

--> Customizable Planet

--> Upgradable Satellites

--> Multiple Planet options for protection

--> Multiple Satellites available to destroy

Small game but endless fun !
There might be ducks too !


For compliments or comments or hate comments - manikantlawania@ymail.com everything welcome :)
Please donate if you wish to, as I'm building another indie game called "Survivalism"
